formElement.label: ESX Connection:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.

formElement.label: VM Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the source virtual machine.

formElement.label: Snapshot Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of snapshot to revert to.

formElement.label: Power On?
formElement.documentation: If checked, Power on the virtual machine after being reverted.

formElement.label: Number of VMs:
formElement.documentation: Number of virtual machines to revert (default is 1). If the value is greater than 1, a suffix is added to VM names. The suffix consists of an underscore and the VM number ('_#').

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
